Content: The Department of Meteorology says that showers or thundershowers will occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa and Central provinces and in Galle and Matara districts today (Feb. 02). A few showers may occur in Uva province and in the Batticaloa, Hambantota and Ampara districts, it says. Moreover, the Department says that fairly heavy falls (about 75mm) can be expected at some places in the Nuwara-Eliya, Ratnapura and Kegalle districts. There may be temporary localized strong winds during thundershowers and the general public is requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by lightning activity.
